features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything You Need to Manage Your Electricity
features.description: CatatToken.ID provides all the tools you need to understand consumption patterns and optimize your electricity spending.
features.feature1Desc: Visualize your consumption with premium charts. Track usage patterns daily, weekly, or monthly with glassmorphism design.
features.feature2Desc: Know exactly when your token will run out. See remaining kWh and predicted depletion date to avoid blackouts.
features.feature3Desc: Auto-calculate new meter position based on token purchase. Smart pre-fill makes recording top-ups effortless.
features.feature4Desc: Configure monthly budget with alert thresholds. Get visual warnings when approaching your spending limit.
features.feature5Desc: Official PLN tariff groups (R1, R1M, R2, R3, B1, B2) with accurate cost calculations for your power capacity.
features.feature6Desc: Your data is securely stored in the cloud and accessible from any device. Never lose your electricity records.
